patthana22.21:1.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.21:2.1: Hetuyā pannarasa, ārammaṇe pannarasa, adhipatiyā cuddasa …pe… purejāte āsevane cuddasa …pe… avigate pannarasa.
patthana22.21:3.1: Napītisahagataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.21:5.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.21:6.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.21:7.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.21:8.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cuddasa.
patthana22.21:9.1: Naācayagāmiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca apacayagāmī hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.21:10.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.21:11.1: Nasekkhaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asekkho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.21:12.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
